flavorText:
"Don't worry, there's plenty for everyone."
—Vickon, Eleventh Company battlemage

foreignData.flavorText:
„Keine Sorge, es reicht für alle."
—Vickon, Kampfmagierin der Elften Kompanie
foreignData.name: Äthersauger
foreignData.text: Jeder Spieler legt jede angreifende Kreatur, die er besitzt, auf oder unter seine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Tranquilos, hay de sobra para todos".
—Vickon, maga de guerra de la decimoprimera compañía
foreignData.name: Tornados de éter
foreignData.text: Por cada criatura atacante, su propietario la pone en la parte superior o en el fondo de su biblioteca.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Pas d'inquiétude, il y en aura pour tout le monde. »
—Vickon, mage de bataille de la onzième compagnie
foreignData.name: Projections d'Éther
foreignData.text: Pour chaque créature attaquante, son propriétaire la met au-dessus ou au-dessous de sa bibliothèque.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Non preoccuparti, ne ho in abbondanza per tutti."
—Vickon, maga combattente dell'Undicesima Compagnia
foreignData.name: Vortici d'Etere
foreignData.text: Per ogni creatura attaccante, il suo proprietario la mette in cima o in fondo al proprio grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「心配するな。全員分をしっかり用意してある。」
――第十一中隊戦闘魔道士、ヴィッコン
foreignData.name: 霊気渦竜巻
foreignData.text: 各攻撃クリーチャーにつきそれぞれ、それのオーナーはそれを自分のライブラリーの一番上か一番下に置く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Não se preocupe, tem o bastante para todos."
— Vickon, mago de batalha da Décima Primeira Companhia
foreignData.name: Tubos de Éter
foreignData.text: Para cada criatura atacante, seu dono a coloca no topo ou no fundo do próprio grimório.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Не волнуйся, всем хватит».
— Викон, боевой маг Одиннадцатой Роты
foreignData.name: Эфирные Смерчи
foreignData.text: Владелец каждого из атакующих существ кладет то существо на верх или в низ своей библиотеки.

foreignData.flavorText:
「别担心，人人有份。」
～第十一连战法师维孔
foreignData.name: 乙太龙卷
foreignData.text: 对每个进行攻击的生物而言，其拥有者将它置于其牌库顶或牌库底。

foreignData.flavorText:
「別擔心，人人有份。」
～第十一連戰法師維孔
foreignData.name: 乙太龍捲
foreignData.text: 對每個進行攻擊的生物而言，其擁有者將它置於其牌庫頂或牌庫底。

name: Aetherspouts
originalText: For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

rulings.text: The owner of each attacking creature chooses whether to put it on the top or bottom of their library. The active player (the player whose turn it is) makes all of their choices first, followed by each other player in turn order.

If an effect puts two or more cards on the top or bottom of a library at the same time, the owner of those cards may arrange them in any order. That library's owner doesn't reveal the order in which the cards go into their library.

text: For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
